thig2.10:1.2: I went out from the dwelling place.
thig2.10:1.3: I had not attained peace of mind,
thig2.10:1.4: and had no power over the mind.
thig2.10:2.3: Obtained is the destruction of craving,
thig2.10:2.4: done is the teaching of the Buddha."
thig2.10:4.1: The Chapter of the Twos is finished.
